item.title: Climate Resilience Fund Database
item.description:
The Climate Resilience Fund is an organization that promotes sustainablility for communities

Visit the Climate Resilience Fund’s Database here! (https://www.climateresiliencefund.org/planning-resources/)

item.title: Joint Fire Science Exchange Database
item.description:
The Joint Fire Science Exchange database.

Helpful for finding global wildland fire research.

Visit the JSFE Database website here! (https://firescience.gov/ords/prd/jf_jfsp/jf_jfsp/r/jfspublic/research-search?session=2765587292715)

item.title: Northwest Fire Science Consortium Database
item.description:
Northwest Fire Science Consortium research database

Visit the NWFSC research database website here! (https://nwfirescience.org/research-database)
